verses.kjv: And there came one of the seven angels which had the seven vials, and talked with me, saying unto me, Come hither; I will shew unto thee the judgment of the great whore that sitteth upon many waters:
verses.ct: Then one of the 7 angels who carried the 7 bowls came and spoke to me. He said, "Come here, and I will show you the judgment that is coming on the notorious prostitute who sits over many waters."

verses.kjv: With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.
verses.ct: "The kings of the earth have been sexually immoral with her, and the people of the earth have become intoxicated on the wine of her sexual immorality."

verses.kjv: So he carried me away in the spirit into the wilderness: and I saw a woman sit upon a scarlet coloured beast, full of names of blasphemy, having seven heads and ten horns.
verses.ct: He carried me away in the spirit to a wilderness, and there I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast that was covered with blasphemous names. The beast had 7 heads and 10 horns.

verses.kjv: And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication:
verses.ct: The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, decorated with gold, precious stones, and pearls. She held a golden cup in her hand, filled with disgusting things and the filth of her sexual immorality.

verses.kjv: And upon her forehead was a name written, MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.
verses.ct: Written on her forehead was a name: MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF PROSTITUTES AND OF THE DISGUSTING THINGS OF THE EARTH.

verses.kjv: And I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus: and when I saw her, I wondered with great admiration.
verses.ct: I could see that the woman was drunk — drunk on the blood of God's holy people and the blood of those who were killed for their testimony about Jesus. When I saw her, I was completely astonished.

verses.kjv: And the angel said unto me, Wherefore didst thou marvel? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carrieth her, which hath the seven heads and ten horns.
verses.ct: The angel asked me, "Why are you so amazed? I will explain to you the mystery of the woman and of the beast she rides, the one with 7 heads and 10 horns."

verses.kjv: The beast that thou sawest was, and is not; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit, and go into perdition: and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, when they behold the beast that was, and is not, and yet is.
verses.ct: "The beast you saw once existed, does not exist now, and is about to rise from the bottomless pit before going to its destruction. The people living on earth whose names have not been written in the book of life since the creation of the world will be amazed when they see the beast — because it once existed, does not exist now, and yet will come again."

verses.kjv: And here is the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.
verses.ct: "This calls for a mind that has wisdom. The 7 heads represent 7 mountains on which the woman sits."

verses.kjv: And there are seven kings: five are fallen, and one is, and the other is not yet come; and when he cometh, he must continue a short space.
verses.ct: "They also represent 7 kings: 5 have already fallen, 1 currently rules, and the last has not yet arrived. When he does come, he will only remain for a brief time."

verses.kjv: And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goeth into perdition.
verses.ct: "The beast that once existed but does not exist now is itself an 8th king. It belongs to the 7 and is heading for destruction."

verses.kjv: And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings, which have received no kingdom as yet; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast.
verses.ct: "The 10 horns you saw represent 10 kings who have not yet received their kingdoms, but they will receive authority to rule as kings for 1 hour alongside the beast."

verses.kjv: These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.
verses.ct: "These kings are united in purpose, and they will hand over their power and authority to the beast."

verses.kjv: These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.
verses.ct: "They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will defeat them, because he is Lord of lords and King of kings. Those who are with him are the called, the chosen, and the faithful."

verses.kjv: And he saith unto me, The waters which thou sawest, where the whore sitteth, are peoples, and multitudes, and nations, and tongues.
verses.ct: Then the angel told me, "The waters you saw, where the prostitute sits, represent peoples, crowds, nations, and languages."

verses.kjv: And the ten horns which thou sawest upon the beast, these shall hate the whore, and shall make her desolate and naked, and shall eat her flesh, and burn her with fire.
verses.ct: "The 10 horns you saw on the beast — they will turn against the prostitute. They will strip her bare and leave her desolate, devour her flesh, and burn her up with fire."

verses.kjv: For God hath put in their hearts to fulfil his will, and to agree, and give their kingdom unto the beast, until the words of God shall be fulfilled.
verses.ct: "For God has placed it in their hearts to carry out his purpose by agreeing together to give their royal authority to the beast, until God's words are completely fulfilled."

verses.kjv: And the woman which thou sawest is that great city, which reigneth over the kings of the earth.
verses.ct: "The woman you saw represents the great city that rules over the kings of the earth."
